definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
MURAKAMI Haruki (1949-), Japanese novelist and translator

sentences.english: Murakami haruki is currently a very famous author in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 村上春树是日本当代著名作家。

sentences.english: His wife, Yoko Takahashi, is his first reader.
sentences.chinese: 村上春树的妻子高桥洋子是他的第一个读者。

sentences.english: There was a wedding in the village: the ugly girl and her husband were invited.
sentences.chinese: 村上有人结婚邀请了丑女孩和她的丈夫。

sentences.english: The first production is an interactive EP, a soundtrack of Haruki Murakami.
sentences.chinese: 首张作品《树音》为村上春树的原声配乐。

sentences.english: Ryu Murakami is the author of “Popular Hits of the Showa Era.”
sentences.chinese: 村上龙是《昭和歌谣大全》的作者。

sentences.english: He likes Haruki Murakami , I also liked detective story, the logic in the book.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢村上春树，也喜欢推理小说，具有逻辑性的书。

sentences.english: Murakami Haruki' s novels possess both the characteristics of the popular literature and the scholastic literature.
sentences.chinese: 村上春树的小说兼具大众文学与精英文学的特点。

sentences.english: Murakami quit smoking and started running.
sentences.chinese: 村上戒了烟，并开始跑步。

sentences.english: By Haruki Murakami. This guy is such an imaginative writer.
sentences.chinese: 作者村上春树，他是一位充满想象力的作家。

sentences.english: The 59-year-old sells millions of books in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 59岁的村上在日本的图书销量达上千万。

sentences.english: Once the storm is over, eagle rock sounds cheerful again uncertain in Murakami.
sentences.chinese: 雨过天晴，岩鹰欢快的叫声重又在村上飘忽。

sentences.english: The writing of Haruki Murakami is affected deeply by modern and contemporary literature of the west.
sentences.chinese: 村上春树的创作，明显受到了西方现当代文学的影响。

sentences.english: Murakami was a late bloomer, writing his first work at age 29.
sentences.chinese: 村上春树大器晚成，29岁才写他的第一部作品。

sentences.english: His father died two years ago, his mother is still alive.
sentences.chinese: 村上春树的父亲两年前去世了，母亲还健在。

sentences.english: Perhaps the most striking thing about Murakami is his creativity.
sentences.chinese: 也许村上最吸引人的事是他的创造力。

definition: Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
branch secretary/secretary of a branch of the Communist Party or the Communist Youth League/abbr. for 支部書記|支部书记
Tienchung town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan/Tanaka (Japanese surname)
